ns0:foreignObject.html:div:
Move one square in any direction, and roll AGL + 1d6 with DC 4. On a failure, gain the 'prone' card. Double the DC of the above check to move two squares in a straight line.
Retrieval: 1 Fatigue

movement
reaction

Each priority tick after this card is activated (including the tick it is activated on), you may:
Move one square in any direction. Your movement has an effective priority of 0 (means you can't dodge with normal movement just because you have high AGL)
pick up/put down/otherwise manipulate an item.
Return this card to your hand
movement

Target: One square within reach 1 or your own square
Deal (1d4 - 2 + STR/2) damage.
Return this card to your hand

strike
unarmed

Target: One square within reach 1 or your own square
Your target rolls a DC (STR + 2) STR or AGL + 1d8 check. If they fail, they move one square in any direction, your choice, and your strikes against them next round have +2 damage. If they fail by 2 or more, you may also give them the 'prone' card.
Return this card to your hand

strike
unarmed

Requires a dagger
Choose one of:
Deal (TEC/2 - 2 adv: 1d8 + STR/2) damage, targeting one square within reach 1 or your own square. Gain +2 PRI vs armor
Deal (TEC/2 - 6 adv: 1d8 + STR/2, 1-3 on die means 0 dmg) damage, targeting a line within reach STR * 4. Your dagger ends up at the end of the line or in the square of whatever you hit.
Return this card to your hand

strike
precise

Requires a bright flashlight
Target a cone until it is three squares wide, then target a three-squares-wide line. Any attack facing into the bean made by anyone in the beam takes two degrees of disadvantage. Each tick after this card is activated, you can move the beam.
Return this card to your hand

Requires some sort of splashable liquid.
Target a line of length 3. The nearest creature along that line gets hit by your liquid. Lose the liquid.
Return this card to your hand
strike

Requires a longsword
Choose one of:
Deal TEC adv: 1d12 + STR/2 damage, targeting a line of three squares.
Deal {DMG} damage, targeting a cone of two squares.
Return this card to your hand
strike

Requires a giant hammer
Choose one of:
Overhand Strike: Deal STRd6 damage to a square within reach two of you. Anyone (except you) within one square of that roll 1d6 + AGL with DC (STR - 2) * 2 or fall prone
Sweep Strike: Deal (STR/2)d4 damage, targeting a cone of two squares.
Return this card to your hand
strike

Requires a club of some sort
Deal (STR/2)d4 damage, targeting a cone of two squares.
Return this card to your hand
strike

Chose one of the eight squares immediately next to you. Any attack originating in or passing through that square hits your shield instead of you. If your shield is destroyed (there could be rules for this, but the add complexity, so for now 'attack powerful enough to break a sheild' is GM fiat), any leftover damage continues toward the original target
Return this card to your hand
reaction

Chose a ranged weapon and select a line to target. Gain the 'Aimed' card for that ranged weapon with that target. Return this card to your hand. You may immediately play and activate a 'Ranged attack' card using your selected weapon.
Return this card to your hand

Requires the 'aimed' card to be active for a handgun
Deal TEC/2 - 4 adv: 2d8 dmg, pen 3, with a miss threshold of 2 (1-2 on either die means 0 dmg) targeting a your aimed-at line, up to 20 squares. Roll damage for each target in the line seperately, and stop once any of them deal 0 damage. Remove 1 ammo. Do not discard your 'aimed' card
Return this card to your hand.

ranged attack
firearm

Requires the 'aimed' card to be active for a long gun
Deal TEC/2 - 3 adv: 2d8 dmg, pen 8, with a miss threshold of 2 (1-2 on either die means 0 dmg) targeting a your aimed-at line, up to 30 squares. Roll damage for each target in the line seperately, and stop once any of them deal 0 damage. Remove 1 ammo. Do not discard your 'aimed' card
Return this card to your hand.

ranged attack
firearm

Add 3 to any one of your stats on all opposed checks when you are the defender as long as this card is active
Return this card to your hand

Upkeep 1
reaction
Tag an aspect
magic

You may spend fatigue at any time:
Spend 1 Fatigue to reroll a die
Spend 1 Fatige to add 1 to the priority of any card
Spend 2 Fatigue to gain +1 AP
